/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray, reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky, hinting at the cold winter season. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant energy.
